author: _shemnon
content: Does anyone in stateless have a from-genesis witness/stateless dataset?  It can be an outdated form.  It would be useful to have when we have questions like "what is the maximum amount of memory any executed transaction has consumed"

author: jsign
content:
not that i'm aware. i agree that would be quite useful -- but i think ultimately what would even more useful is having some historical debug_trace(Tx|Block)  (with stack, mem, etc). that's a massive dataset, but with partitioned parquet files would be very useful.
I actually want something similar for some stateless analysis i'm baking.
